# Basic Statistical Concepts {#stat-concepts}

* Data types
    - categorical (qualitative)
        - nominal (e.g. male, female, ...)
        - ordinal (e.g. low, medium, high)
    - numerical (quantitative)
        - discrete (e.g. counts)
        - continious (e.g. measurements)
* Distributions
    * Shape
        - modality
        - symmetry
    * Centre
        - mean
        - median
    * Spread
        - range
        - quantiles
        - variance
        - standard deviation
